summary.span: 封裝 GDI+ 繪圖介面。

span.span: Encapsulates a GDI+ drawing surface.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法給顯示裝置繪圖物件。The class provides methods for drawing objects to the display device. A與特定裝置內容相關聯。A is associated with a specific device context. 您可以取得藉由呼叫物件方法繼承自物件上的，或藉由處理控制項的事件及存取屬性類別。You can obtain a object by calling the method on an object that inherits from , or by handling a control's event and accessing the property of the class. 您也可以建立物件從映像使用方法。You can also create a object from an image by using the method. 如需有關建立物件，請參閱[How to： 建立繪製的圖形物件](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-create-graphics-objects-for-drawing.md)。For more information about creating a object, see [How to: Create Graphics Objects for Drawing](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-create-graphics-objects-for-drawing.md). 您可以藉由繪製許多不同的圖案和線條物件。You can draw many different shapes and lines by using a object. 如需如何繪製線條和圖案的詳細資訊，請參閱特定`Draw` *GraphicalElement*行或您想要繪製的圖形的方法。For more information about how to draw lines and shapes, see the specific `Draw`*GraphicalElement* method for the line or shape you want to draw. 這些方法包括， ， ， ，和。These methods include , , , , and . 如需如何繪製線條和圖案的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用畫筆繪製線條和圖案](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-a-pen-to-draw-lines-and-shapes.md)和[使用筆刷填滿圖形](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-a-brush-to-fill-shapes.md)。For more information about how to draw lines and shapes, see [Using a Pen to Draw Lines and Shapes](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-a-pen-to-draw-lines-and-shapes.md) and [Using a Brush to Fill Shapes](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-a-brush-to-fill-shapes.md). 您也可以藉由繪製影像和圖示和方法，分別。You can also draw images and icons by using the and methods, respectively. 在畫面上執行之繪圖介面的色彩資料位元區塊傳輸物件，請參閱。To perform a bit-block transfer of color data from the screen to the drawing surface of the object, see . 如需有關如何繪製影像物件，請參閱[使用影像、 點陣圖、 圖示和中繼檔](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/working-with-images-bitmaps-icons-and-metafiles.md)。For more information about how to draw images with a object, see [Working with Images, Bitmaps, Icons, and Metafiles](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/working-with-images-bitmaps-icons-and-metafiles.md). 此外，您可以在此操作所使用的座標系統物件。In addition, you can manipulate the coordinate system used by the object. 如需有關座標系統以及如何操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[座標系統和轉換](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/coordinate-systems-and-transformations.md)。For more information on the coordinate system and how to manipulate it, see [Coordinate Systems and Transformations](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/coordinate-systems-and-transformations.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例為了搭配 Windows Form 使用而設計，而且需要物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms and requires a object. 物件命名為`e`的參數和事件處理常式。The object is named `e` and is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file. 檔案為 SampImag.jpg，並使用的範例資料夾中。The file is named SampImag.jpg and is located in the folder of the example. - 建立要繪製影像的左上角的點。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 藉由將未縮放的影像繪製至畫面物件。Draws the unscaled image to the screen by using a object. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#40)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法適用於只有當此聯。This method is valid only if this is associated with a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式，以及`thisForm`、範例。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler, as well as `thisForm`, the for the example. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 會建立暫存建立中繼檔和取得`hdc`，其裝置內容控制代碼。Creates a temporary for creating the metafile and gets an `hdc`, a handle to its device context. - 建立新的中繼檔使用`hdc`。Creates a new metafile using the `hdc`. - 建立顯示中繼檔從。Creates a for display of the metafile from the . - 中繼檔繪製的矩形。Draws a rectangle to the metafile. - 中繼檔中加入註解。Adds a comment to the metafile. - 處置的的中繼檔關閉中繼檔。Disposes the for the metafile-which closes the metafile. - 處置中繼檔。Disposes the metafile. - 釋放暫存`hdc`。Releases the temporary `hdc`. - 處置暫存。Disposes the temporary . - 從先前建立的檔案中建立第二個中繼檔。Creates a second metafile from the previously created file. - 將中繼檔繪製到螢幕。Draws the metafile to the screen. - 處置中繼檔。Disposes the metafile. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 以這個 的目前狀態儲存圖形容器，並開啟及使用新的圖形容器。

span.span: Saves a graphics container with the current state of this and opens and uses a new graphics container.

returns.span: 這個方法會傳回 ，表示在方法呼叫時這個 的狀態。

span.span: This method returns a that represents the state of this at the time of the method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法加方法，以建立巢狀的圖形容器。Use this method with the method to create nested graphics containers. 圖形容器保留圖形的狀態，例如轉換、 裁剪區域和呈現屬性。Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties. 當您呼叫方法，保留狀態的資訊區塊放在堆疊上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法會傳回可識別該資訊區塊。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 當您識別物件傳遞至方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，且用來還原的時間當時的狀態方法呼叫。When you pass the identifying object to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 可以是巢狀容器。也就是說，您可以呼叫方法多次，才能呼叫方法。Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次呼叫方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您收到資訊區塊。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個方法，回復成的時間當時的狀態方法呼叫傳回的特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 資訊區塊放置在堆疊上的方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後的所有資訊區塊放都置於該堆疊上方法呼叫也會移除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 呼叫相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就像方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫。Just as an method call is paired with a method call, a method call is paired with a method call. 當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同樣地，當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 所建立的圖形狀態方法包含預設的圖形狀態的呈現品質，則任何現有的呼叫方法時的呈現品質狀態變更會重設為預設值。The graphics state established by the method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 會開啟新的圖形容器，並儲存舊的容器。Opens a new graphics container and saves the old container. - 將轉譯的容器中的全局座標。Translates the world coordinates in the container. - 會以紅色矩形填滿 (已轉換的座標) 新的容器。Fills a red rectangle in the (translated coordinates of the) new container. - 關閉新的容器，並還原已儲存的容器。Closes the new container and restores the saved container. - 填滿儲存容器的綠色矩形 （至未轉換的座標）。Fills a green rectangle (to the untranslated coordinates) of the saved container. 結果會是大小的綠色矩形，這個矩形相同的紅色矩形覆疊。The result is a green rectangle that overlies a red rectangle of the same size. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次呼叫方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您收到資訊區塊。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個方法，回復成的時間當時的狀態方法呼叫傳回的特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 資訊區塊放置在堆疊上的方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後的所有資訊區塊放都置於該堆疊上方法呼叫也會移除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 呼叫相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就像方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫。Just as an method call is paired with a method call, a method call is paired with a method call. 當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同樣地，當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 這個方法會指定與新的圖形容器的縮放變換`dstrect`和`srcrect`參數。This method specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container with the `dstrect` and `srcrect` parameters. 小數位數等於轉換，當套用至`srcrect`，導致`dstrect`。The scale is equal to the transformation that, when applied to `srcrect`, results in `dstrect`. 所建立的圖形狀態方法包含預設的圖形狀態的呈現品質，則任何現有的呼叫方法時的呈現品質狀態變更會重設為預設值。The graphics state established by the method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立兩個矩形來指定新容器的縮放變換。Creates two rectangles to specify a scale transformation for the new container. - 會開啟新的圖形容器，並儲存舊的容器。Opens the new graphics container and saves the old container. - 填入紅色矩形 (縮放座標) 新的容器。Fills a red rectangle in the (scaled coordinates of the) new container. - 關閉新的容器，並還原已儲存的容器。Closes the new container and restores the saved container. - 填滿綠色矩形 （至縮放座標中） 的已儲存的容器。Fills a green rectangle (to the unscaled coordinates) of the saved container. 結果會是綠色矩形，這個矩形覆疊較小的紅色矩形。The result is a green rectangle that overlies a smaller red rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法加方法，以建立巢狀的圖形容器。Use this method with the method to create nested graphics containers. 圖形容器保留圖形的狀態，例如轉換、 裁剪區域和呈現屬性。Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties. 當您呼叫方法，保留狀態的資訊區塊放在堆疊上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法會傳回可識別該資訊區塊。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 當您識別物件傳遞至方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，且用來還原的時間當時的狀態方法呼叫。When you pass the identifying object to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 可以是巢狀容器。也就是說，您可以呼叫方法多次，才能呼叫方法。Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次呼叫方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您收到資訊區塊。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個方法，回復成的時間當時的狀態方法呼叫傳回的特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 資訊區塊放置在堆疊上的方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後的所有資訊區塊放都置於該堆疊上方法呼叫也會移除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 呼叫相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就像方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫。Just as an method call is paired with a method call, a method call is paired with a method call. 當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由`Save`方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the `Save` method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同樣地，當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 這個方法會指定與新的圖形容器的縮放變換`dstrect`和`srcrect`參數。This method specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container with the `dstrect` and `srcrect` parameters. 小數位數等於轉換，當套用至`srcrect`，導致`dstrect`。The scale is equal to the transformation that, when applied to `srcrect`, results in `dstrect`. 所建立的圖形狀態方法包含預設的圖形狀態的呈現品質，則任何現有的呼叫方法時的呈現品質狀態變更會重設為預設值。The graphics state established by the method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立兩個矩形來指定新容器的縮放變換。Creates two rectangles to specify a scale transformation for the new container. - 會開啟新的圖形容器，並儲存舊的容器。Opens the new graphics container and saves the old container. - 填入紅色矩形 (縮放座標) 新的容器。Fills a red rectangle in the (scaled coordinates of the) new container. - 關閉新的容器，並還原已儲存的容器。Closes the new container and restores the saved container. - 填滿綠色矩形 （至縮放座標中） 的已儲存的容器。Fills a green rectangle (to the unscaled coordinates) of the saved container. 結果會是綠色矩形，這個矩形覆疊較小的紅色矩形。The result is a green rectangle that overlies a smaller red rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除圖形物件的狀態，並不應該呼叫時的圖形物件無法更新。The method clears the state of the graphics object and should not be called when the graphics object cannot be updated. 例如，如果安全桌面上呼叫方法中的終端機伺服器工作階段中，可能會發生，離開不一致的狀態物件。For example, if the method is called on a secure desktop in a terminal server session, an may occur, leaving the object in an inconsistent state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會清除之繪圖介面的和系統定莪 teal 色彩設定的背景色彩。The code clears the drawing surface of the and sets the background color to the system-defined teal color. remarks.format: ## Remarks 修改所傳回物件屬性不會影響後續的繪圖物件。Modifying the object returned by the property does not affect subsequent drawing with the object. 若要變更的裁剪區域，取代屬性值與新物件。To change the clip region, replace the property value with a new object. 若要判斷是否為無限的裁剪區域，擷取屬性並呼叫其方法。To determine whether the clipping region is infinite, retrieve the property and call its method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`SetAndFillClip`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `SetAndFillClip` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的矩形的單位由所指定屬性。The unit for resulting rectangle is designated by the property. 預設單位為像素。The default unit is pixels. A通常與控制項相關聯的來源矩形將會相對於該控制項的用戶端區域。A is typically associated with a control and the origin of the rectangle will be relative to the client area of that control. 裁剪區域是無限的如果屬性會傳回一個無意義的大矩形。If the clipping region is infinite, the property returns a meaningless large rectangle. 若要判斷是否為無限的裁剪區域，擷取屬性並呼叫其方法。To determine whether the clipping region is infinite, retrieve the property and call its method.

span.span: that determines the color, width, and style of the arc.

param.name: rect

span.span: structure that defines the boundaries of the ellipse.

param.name: startAngle
param.span: 以度為單位，依順時針方向測量之從 X 軸到弧形開始點的角度。

summary.span: 繪製弧形，表示由 結構所指定的橢圓形的一部分。

span.span: Draws an arc representing a portion of an ellipse specified by a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製弧形，是周邊的橢圓形的一部分。This method draws an arc that is a portion of the perimeter of an ellipse. 定義橢圓形的矩形界限。The ellipse is defined by the boundaries of a rectangle. 弧線是部分之間的橢圓形周邊`startAngle`參數和`startAngle` + `sweepAngle`參數。The arc is the portion of the perimeter of the ellipse between the `startAngle` parameter and the `startAngle` + `sweepAngle` parameters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立黑色畫筆。Creates a black pen. - 建立繫結橢圓形的矩形。Creates a rectangle to bound an ellipse. - 定義開始 （45 度為單位） 和 （270 度） 掃掠角度。Defines the start (45 degrees) and sweep (270 degrees) angles. - 繪製橢圓形弧線至畫面。Draws the elliptical arc to the screen. 結果是遺漏之間的線段的部分橢圓形 + 和-45 度的 x 軸。The result is a partial ellipse missing a segment between + and - 45 degrees of the x axis. remarks.format: ## Remarks 第四個點會從第一個點繪製貝茲曲線。The Bézier curve is drawn from the first point to the fourth point. 第二個和第三個點都控制點，決定曲線的形狀。The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立黑色畫筆。Creates a black pen. - 建立開始、 結束與曲線的兩個控制點。Creates the start, end, and two control points for the curve. - 將貝茲曲線繪製到螢幕。Draws the Bézier curve to the screen. summary.span: 從 結構陣列繪製一系列的貝茲曲線。

span.span: Draws a series of Bézier splines from an array of structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列中的點數應該是 3 的倍數加 1，因為第一個曲線需要有 4 個點，而且任何其他曲線需要 3 點。The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1 because the first spline requires 4 points and any other splines require 3 points each. 第一個貝茲曲線的點陣列中的第四個點會繪製從第一個點。The first Bézier spline is drawn from the first point to the fourth point in the point array. 第二個和第三個點都控制點，決定曲線的形狀。The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve. 每個後續的曲線需要正好是三個的多個點： 兩個控制點和結束點。Each subsequent curve needs exactly three more points: two more control points and an ending point. 前一個曲線的結束點作為起始點，為每個額外的曲線。The ending point of the previous curve is used as the starting point for each additional curve. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立黑色畫筆。Creates a black pen. - 建立開始、 結束和第一個曲線和端點的兩個控制點，第二個曲線的兩個控制點。Creates the start, end, and two control points for a first curve and endpoint and two control points for a second curve. - 繪製到螢幕的後續的貝茲曲線。Draws the successive Bézier curves to the screen. param.name: pen

span.span: that determines the color, width, and height of the curve.

param.span: 定義曲線的 結構陣列。

span.span: Array of structures that define the spline.

summary.span: 繪製由 結構陣列定義的封閉的基本曲線。

span.span: Draws a closed cardinal spline defined by an array of structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線。This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點表示關閉圖形的第一個點。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the figure. 點陣列必須包含至少 4 個結構。The array of points must contain at least four structures. 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。Creates red and green pens. - 會建立七個點來定義曲線。Creates seven points to define a curve. - 若要關閉的多邊形的七個點之間繪製七個紅色的直線。Draws seven red straight lines between the seven points to form a closed polygon. - 繪製封閉的綠色曲線，透過七個點。Draws a green closed curve through the seven points. 此方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。The method uses a default tension of 0.5. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#16)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線。This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 點陣列必須包含至少 4 個結構。The array of points must contain at least four structures. 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。Creates red and green pens. - 會建立七個點來定義曲線。Creates seven points to define a curve. - 若要關閉的多邊形的七個點之間繪製七個紅色的直線。Draws seven red straight lines between the seven points to form a closed polygon. - 繪製封閉的綠色曲線，透過七個點。Draws a green closed curve through the seven points. 此方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。The method uses a default tension of 0.5. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線。This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 點陣列必須包含至少 4 個結構。The array of points must contain at least four structures. `tension`參數會決定曲線的形狀。The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline. 如果值`tension`參數是 0.0，這個方法會繪製的直線線段連接的點。If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points. 通常，`tension`參數小於或等於 1.0 f。Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F. 透過 1.0 f 的值不會產生不尋常的結果。Values over 1.0F produce unusual results. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。Creates red and green pens. - 會建立七個點來定義曲線。Creates seven points to define the curve. - 若要建立多邊形七個點之間畫出了七個紅色的直線。Draws seven red straight lines between the seven points to form a polygon. - 建立的張力，填滿模式設定。Creates tension and fill mode settings. - 繪製封閉的綠色曲線，透過七個點。Draws a green closed curve through the seven points. 方法使用 1.0 的張力，填滿模式設定為`FillMode.Alternate`。The method uses a tension of 1.0 and sets the fill mode to `FillMode.Alternate`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線。This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 點陣列必須包含至少 4 個結構。The array of points must contain at least four structures. `tension`參數會決定曲線的形狀。The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline. 如果值`tension`參數是 0.0，這個方法會繪製的直線線段連接的點。If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points. 通常，`tension`參數小於或等於 1.0 f。Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F. 透過 1.0 f 的值不會產生不尋常的結果。Values over 1.0F produce unusual results. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。Creates red and green pens. - 會建立七個點來定義曲線。Creates seven points to define the curve. - 若要建立多邊形七個點之間畫出了七個紅色的直線。Draws seven red straight lines between the seven points to form a polygon. - 建立的張力，填滿模式設定。Creates tension and fill mode settings. - 繪製封閉的綠色曲線，透過七個點。Draws a green closed curve through the seven points. 方法使用 1.0 的張力，填滿模式設定為`FillMode.Alternate`。The method uses a tension of 1.0 and sets the fill mode to `FillMode.Alternate`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#19)]

summary.span: 繪製穿過指定陣列的 結構的基本曲線。

span.span: Draws a cardinal spline through a specified array of structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製在通過陣列中每個點的基本曲線。This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 點陣列必須包含至少三個曲線要繪製的結構。The array of points must contain at least three structures for a curve to be drawn. 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。Creates red and green pens. - 會建立七個點來定義曲線。Creates seven points to define a curve. - 若要不完整的多邊形七個點之間繪製六個紅色的直線。Draws six red straight lines between the seven points to form an incomplete polygon. - 繪製穿過七個點的開啟綠色曲線。Draws an open green curve through the seven points. 此方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。The method uses a default tension of 0.5. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製在通過陣列中每個點的基本曲線。This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 點陣列必須包含至少三個曲線要繪製的結構。The array of points must contain at least three structures for a curve to be drawn. 值`offset`參數指定要在陣列中略過的項目數目。The value of the `offset` parameter specifies the number of elements to skip in the array. 已略過的項目之後的第一個項目代表曲線開始點。The first element after the skipped elements represents the starting point of the curve. 值`numberOfSegments`參數之後的起點，若要在曲線中繪製指定的區段數目。The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter specifies the number of segments, after the starting point, to draw in the curve. 值`numberOfSegments`參數必須至少為 1。The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be at least 1. 值`offset`參數加上值`numberOfSegments`參數必須是少於陣列中的項目數目`points`參數。The value of the `offset` parameter plus the value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be less than the number of elements in the array of the `points` parameter. 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。Creates red and green pens. - 會建立七個點來定義曲線。Creates seven points to define a curve. - 若要不完整的多邊形七個點之間繪製六個紅色的直線。Draws six red straight lines between the seven points to form an incomplete polygon. - 定義起始點的位移和的區段數目。Defines the starting point offset and number of segments. - 繪製的開啟綠色曲線 （從第三個點開始） 透過最後五個點。Draws an open green curve (starting at the third point) through the last five points. 此方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。The method uses a default tension of 0.5. param.span: ，決定曲線的色彩、寬度和樣式。

span.span: that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.

param.name: points
param.span: 定義曲線的 結構陣列。

span.span: Array of structures that define the spline.

param.name: offset
param.span: 從 points 參數陣列第一個項目到曲線開始點的位移。

span.span: Offset from the first element in the array of the points parameter to the starting point in the curve.

param.name: numberOfSegments
param.span: 要在曲線中包括的開始點後的線段數目。

span.span: Number of segments after the starting point to include in the curve.

param.name: tension
param.span: 大於或等於 0.0F 的值，指定曲線的張力。

span.span: Value greater than or equal to 0.0F that specifies the tension of the curve.

summary.span: 使用指定的張力，繪製穿過指定陣列的 結構的基本曲線。

span.span: Draws a cardinal spline through a specified array of structures using a specified tension.

summary.span: 會從陣列開頭位移開始繪製。

span.span: The drawing begins offset from the beginning of the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製在通過陣列中每個點的基本曲線。This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 點陣列必須包含至少三個曲線要繪製的結構。The array of points must contain at least three structures for curve to be drawn. 值`offset`參數指定要在陣列中略過的項目數目。The value of the `offset` parameter specifies the number of elements to skip in the array. 已略過的項目之後的第一個項目代表曲線開始點。The first element after the skipped elements represents the starting point of the curve. 值`numberOfSegments`參數之後的起點，若要在曲線中繪製指定的區段數目。The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter specifies the number of segments, after the starting point, to draw in the curve. 值`numberOfSegments`參數必須至少為 1。The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be at least 1. 值`offset`參數加上值`numberOfSegments`參數必須是少於陣列中的項目數目`points`參數。The value of the `offset` parameter plus the value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be less than the number of elements in the array of the `points` parameter. `tension`參數會決定曲線的形狀。The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline. 如果值`tension`參數是 0.0，這個方法會繪製的直線線段連接的點。If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points. 通常，`tension`參數小於或等於 1.0 f。Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F. 透過 1.0 f 的值不會產生不尋常的結果。Values over 1.0F produce unusual results. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。Creates red and green pens. - 會建立七個點來定義曲線。Creates seven points to define a curve. - 若要不完整的多邊形七個點之間繪製六個紅色的直線。Draws six red straight lines between the seven points to form an incomplete polygon. - 定義起始點的位移和的區段數目。Defines the starting point offset and number of segments. - 定義張力。Defines the tension. - 繪製的開啟綠色曲線 （從第三個點開始） 透過最後五個點。Draws an open green curve (starting at the third point) through the last five points. 方法會設定為 1.0 的張力。The method sets the tension to 1.0. remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches. 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 這個方法會繪製影像使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數）。This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果您呼叫此方法以繪製該映像的裝置解析度為 96 dpi 上時，所呈現影像的像素寬度會 (216/72) \* 96 = 288。If you call this method to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)\*96 = 288. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要繪製影像的左上角的點。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 無縮放的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the unscaled image to the screen. param.span: 定義平行四邊形之三個 結構的陣列。

span.span: Array of three structures that define a parallelogram.

summary.span: 以指定的形狀和大小，在指定之位置繪製指定的 。

span.span: Draws the specified at the specified location and with the specified shape and size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 所表示的影像`image`參數可調整且修剪來符合所指定的平行四邊形的圖形`destPoints`參數。The image represented by the `image` parameter is scaled and sheared to fit the shape of the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 將影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the image to the screen. 平行四邊形的位置影像的畫面上，以及原始映像大小和大小與形狀的平行四邊形決定調整和修剪繪製影像。The position of the parallelogram locates the image on the screen, and the size of the original image and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#61](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#61)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#61](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#61)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#61](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#61)]

span.span: Draws the specified portion of the specified at the specified location and with the specified size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`繪製的物件。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 這個部分會調整及修剪來配合所指定的平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 建立矩形來選取要繪製之影像的一部分。Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 將影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the image to the screen. 平行四邊形的位置找出的映像在畫面上，並矩形和大小的大小和形狀的平行四邊形的決定調整和修剪繪製影像。The position of the parallelogram locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#36)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#36)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`繪製的物件。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 這個部分會調整及修剪來配合所指定的平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的目的地平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a destination parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 建立來源矩形要從中擷取映像的一部分。Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 設定來源矩形的測量的單位為像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 將影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the image to the screen. 映像會放置在螢幕上的目的地平行四邊形的位置，來源矩形和大小的大小和形狀目的平行四邊形判斷的縮放和修剪繪製影像，並決定矩形的大小原始的映像的哪些部分會繪製到螢幕。The position of the destination parallelogram locates the image on the screen, the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image, and the size of the rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen. param.span: ，指定 image 物件的重新著色和 Gamma 資訊。

span.span: that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the image object.

summary.span: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製所指定 之指定部分。

span.span: Draws the specified portion of the specified at the specified location and with the specified size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`繪製的物件。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 這個部分會調整及修剪來配合所指定的平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的目的地平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a destination parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 建立來源矩形要從中擷取映像的一部分。Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 設定來源矩形的測量的單位為像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 將原始的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的額外的平行四邊形。Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定為具有較大比一般的 gamma 值調整影像的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 已調整的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 原始、 未調整目的地平行四邊形的位置上螢幕、 來源矩形的大小和大小的映像以及目的地的平行四邊形的圖形會決定縮放和修剪繪製的影像，以及的大小矩形判斷原始映像的哪個部分要繪製到螢幕。For the original, unadjusted destination parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image, and the size of the rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#43](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#43)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#43](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#43)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#43)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 例如，像素寬度 360 和每 72 英吋的水平解析度的影像具有實體寬度為 5 英吋。For example, an image with a pixel width of 360 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 5 inches. 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 這個方法會繪製影像使用的實體大小，因此影像部分會有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數） 的一部分。This method draws a portion of an image using its physical size, so the image portion will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假設影像部分有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。For example, suppose an image portion has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果您呼叫這個方法的裝置解析度為 96 dpi 上繪製影像部分時，所呈現的影像部分的像素寬度會 (216/72) \* 96 = 288。If you call this method to draw that image portion on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image portion will be (216/72)\*96 = 288. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要繪製影像的左上角座標。Creates the coordinates at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 建立來源矩形要從中擷取映像的一部分。Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 設定來源矩形的測量的單位為像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 將影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the image to the screen. 來源矩形的大小會決定哪些部分未縮放的原始影像繪製至螢幕。The size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the unscaled original image is drawn to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#59](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#59)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#59](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#59)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#59](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#59)]

param.name: image

param.name: destPoints
param.span: 定義平行四邊形之三個 結構的陣列。

span.span: Array of three structures that define a parallelogram.

param.name: srcRect
param.span: 結構，指定 image 物件要繪製的部分。

param.name: srcUnit
param.span: 列舉的成員，指定 srcRect 參數所使用的測量單位。

param.name: imageAttr
param.span: ，指定 image 物件的重新著色和 Gamma 資訊。

span.span: that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the image object.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，在繪製影像期間指定要呼叫的方法。

span.span: delegate that specifies a method to call during the drawing of the image.

param.span: 這個方法會經常被呼叫，以檢查是否要根據應用程式所決定的準則來停止執行 方法。

span.span: This method is called frequently to check whether to stop execution of the method according to application-determined criteria.

summary.span: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製所指定 之指定部分。

span.span: Draws the specified portion of the specified at the specified location and with the specified size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`繪製的物件。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 這個部分會調整及修剪來配合所指定的平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. 具有這個多載`callback`參數提供的方式，一旦啟動根據應用程式所決定的準則就會停止映像的繪圖。This overload with the `callback` parameter provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria determined by the application. 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動超出螢幕，在其中應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會先定義回呼方法，以便委派; 定義是最簡單，而且只是測試以查看是否方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 此範例的主要本文會執行下列動作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 建立的執行個體回呼方法：Creates an instance of the callback method: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 建立矩形來選取要繪製之影像的一部分。Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 將原始的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的額外的平行四邊形。Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定為具有較大比一般的 gamma 值調整影像的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 已調整的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 針對原始、 未調整平行四邊形，映像會放置在畫面上，位置以及矩形和大小的大小和形狀的平行四邊形的決定的縮放和修剪繪製影像。For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. 由於這個範例會使用多載未通過`callBackData`參數，回呼傳回`true`，這會導致方法結束時，和包含在此範例中的例外狀況處理程式碼會列印出例外狀況文字，而非繪製影像。Because this example uses an overload that does not pass a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `true`, which causes the method to end, and the exception-handling code included in the example prints out the exception text rather than drawing the image. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#38)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#38)]

定義是最簡單，而且只是測試以查看是否方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 此範例的主要本文會執行下列動作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 建立的執行個體回呼方法。Creates an instance of the callback method. - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 建立矩形來選取要繪製之影像的一部分。Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 將原始的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的額外的平行四邊形。Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定為具有較大比一般的 gamma 值調整影像的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 已調整的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 針對原始、 未調整平行四邊形，映像會放置在畫面上，位置以及矩形和大小的大小和形狀的平行四邊形的決定的縮放和修剪繪製影像。For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. 由於這個範例會使用傳遞的多載`callBackData`參數，回呼傳回`false`，這會導致方法，若要繼續，與範例調整的影像繪製至畫面。Because this example uses an overload that passes a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `false`, which causes the method to continue, and the example draws the adjusted image to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`繪製的物件。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 這個部分會調整及修剪來配合所指定的平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. 具有這個多載`callback`和`callbackData`參數提供的方式，根據準則和資料取決於應用程式啟動之後停止映像的繪圖。This overload with the `callback` and `callbackData` parameters provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria and data determined by the application. 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動超出螢幕，在其中應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的`Pa`事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Pa` event handler. 程式碼會先定義回呼方法，以便委派; 定義是最簡單，而且只是測試以查看是否方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 此範例的主要本文會執行下列動作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 建立的執行個體回呼方法。Creates an instance of the callback method. - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 建立矩形來選取要繪製之影像的一部分。Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 將原始的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的額外的平行四邊形。Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定為具有較大比一般的 gamma 值調整影像的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 已調整的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 針對原始、 未調整平行四邊形，映像會放置在畫面上，位置以及矩形和大小的大小和形狀的平行四邊形的決定的縮放和修剪繪製影像。For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. 由於這個範例會使用傳遞的多載`callBackData`參數，回呼傳回`false`，這會導致方法，若要繼續，與範例調整的影像繪製至畫面。Because this example uses an overload that passes a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `false`, which causes the method to continue, and the example draws the adjusted image to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#45](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#45)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#45](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#45)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#45)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`參數指定矩形的部分，`image`繪製的物件。The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw. 矩形是相對於來源影像的左上角。The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image. 這個部分會調整為適合所指定的矩形內`destRect`參數。This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要在其中繪製影像的目的地矩形。Creates a destination rectangle in which to draw the image. - 建立要從中擷取映像的一部分的來源矩形的座標。Creates the coordinates of a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 設定來源矩形的測量的單位為像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 將影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the image to the screen. 在畫面上，目的地矩形的位置找出的映像來源和目的地矩形的大小會決定所繪製影像，縮放和來源矩形的大小會決定哪些部分原始影像繪製至畫面。The position of the destination rectangle locates the image on the screen, and the sizes of the source and destination rectangles determine the scaling of the drawn image, and the size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#48)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#48)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`參數指定矩形的部分，`image`繪製的物件。The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw. 矩形是相對於來源影像的左上角。The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image. 這個部分會調整為適合所指定的矩形內`destRect`參數。This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要在其中繪製影像的目的地矩形。Creates a destination rectangle in which to draw the image. - 建立要從中擷取映像的一部分的來源矩形的座標。Creates the coordinates of a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 設定來源矩形的測量的單位為像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 將原始的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的其他矩形。Creates an additional rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定為具有較大比一般的 gamma 值調整影像的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 已調整的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 針對原始、 未調整目的地矩形，會放置位置之映像在畫面上，來源和目的地矩形的大小會決定所繪製影像，縮放和來源矩形的大小會決定哪些部分原始的映像會繪製到螢幕。For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the sizes of the source and destination rectangles determine the scaling of the drawn image, and the size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#53](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#53)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#53](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#53)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#53](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#53)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`參數指定矩形的部分，`image`繪製的物件。The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw. 矩形是相對於來源影像的左上角。The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image. 這個部分會調整為適合所指定的矩形內`destRect`物件。This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` object. 具有這個多載`callback`參數提供的方式，一旦啟動根據應用程式所決定的準則就會停止映像的繪圖。This overload with the `callback` parameter provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria determined by the application. 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動超出螢幕，在其中應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會先定義回呼方法，以便委派; 定義是最簡單，而且只是測試以查看是否方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 此範例的主要本文會執行下列動作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 建立的執行個體回呼方法。Creates an instance of the callback method. - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的目的地矩形的點。Creates points that define a destination rectangle in which to draw the image. - 建立來源矩形來選取要繪製之影像的一部分。Creates a source rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 將原始的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的其他目的地矩形。Creates an additional destination rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定為具有較大比一般的 gamma 值調整影像的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 已調整的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 針對原始、 未調整目的地矩形，影像會放置在畫面上，位置和來源矩形和大小的大小和目的地矩形的圖形會決定所繪製影像的縮放比例。For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image. 由於這個範例會使用多載未通過`callBackData`參數，回呼傳回`true`，這會導致方法結束時，和包含在此範例中的例外狀況處理程式碼會列印出例外狀況文字，而非繪製影像。Because this example uses an overload that does not pass a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `true`, which causes the method to end, and the exception-handling code included in the example prints out the exception text rather than drawing the image. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`參數指定矩形的部分，`image`繪製的物件。The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw. 矩形是相對於來源影像的左上角。The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image. 這個部分會調整為適合所指定的矩形內`destRect`參數。This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter. 具有這個多載`callback`和`callbackData`參數提供的方式，根據準則和資料取決於應用程式啟動之後停止映像的繪圖。This overload with the `callback` and `callbackData` parameters provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria and data determined by the application. 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動超出螢幕，在其中應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會先定義回呼方法，以便委派; 定義是最簡單，而且只是測試以查看是否方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 此範例的主要本文會執行下列動作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 建立的執行個體回呼方法。Creates an instance of the callback method. - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的目的地矩形的點。Creates points that define a destination rectangle in which to draw the image. - 建立來源矩形來選取要繪製之影像的一部分。Creates a source rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 將原始的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的其他目的地矩形。Creates an additional destination rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定為具有較大比一般的 gamma 值調整影像的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 已調整的影像繪製至螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 針對原始、 未調整目的地矩形，影像會放置在畫面上，位置和來源矩形和大小的大小和目的地矩形的圖形會決定所繪製影像的縮放比例。For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image. 由於這個範例會使用傳遞的多載`callBackData`參數，回呼傳回`false`，這會導致方法，若要繼續，與範例調整的影像繪製至畫面。Because this example uses an overload that passes a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `false`, which causes the method to continue, and the example draws the adjusted image to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#51](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#51)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#51)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#51)]

summary.span: 使用原始的實體大小將指定影像繪製於指定位置。

span.span: Draws a specified image using its original physical size at a specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches. 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 方法繪製影像使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數）。The method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果您呼叫解析度為 96 dpi 的裝置上繪製該映像，呈現影像的像素寬度會 (216/72) \* 96 = 288。If you call to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)\*96 = 288. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立的映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要繪製影像的左上角的點。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 使用的實體大小將整個影像繪製。Draws the entire image using its physical size. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#64](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#64)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#64](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#64)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#64](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#64)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋點數） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 實體的寬度，以英吋，映像的單位是像素寬度除以水平解析度。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 例如，216 像素寬度和水平解析度每 72 英吋的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches. 類似的備註適用於像素高度和實體的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 方法繪製影像使用的實體大小，讓映像將會擁有正確的大小是以英吋，不論顯示裝置的解析度 （每英吋點數）。The method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果您呼叫解析度為 96 dpi 的裝置上繪製該映像，呈現影像的像素寬度會 (216/72) \* 96 = 288。If you call to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)\*96 = 288.

span.span: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a structure and two radial lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製由橢圓形和兩條放射線交集的弧形弧線的端點定義的派形。周框定義橢圓形。This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle. 包含的兩條放射線所定義的派形`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數，以及這些放射線橢圓形交集之間的弧度。The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為分別是 360 度或-360 度。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立黑色畫筆。Creates a black pen. - 建立住完整橢圓形的矩形。Creates a rectangle that bounds a complete ellipse. - 定義要繪圖 （相對於 x 軸） 的開始角度和，以繪製 （順時針方向兩者）。Defines the angles at which to start drawing (relative to the x axis) and through which to draw (both in a clockwise direction). - 繪製到螢幕的派形區段。Draws the pie segment to the screen. span.span: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a structure and two radial lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製由橢圓形和兩條放射線交集的弧形弧線的端點定義的派形。周框定義橢圓形。This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle. 包含的兩條放射線所定義的派形`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數，以及這些放射線橢圓形交集之間的弧度。The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為分別是 360 度或-360 度。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立黑色畫筆。Creates a black pen. - 建立住完整橢圓形的矩形。Creates a rectangle that bounds a complete ellipse. - 定義要繪圖 （相對於 x 軸） 的開始角度和，以繪製 （順時針方向兩者）。Defines the angles at which to start drawing (relative to the x axis) and through which to draw (both in a clockwise direction). - 繪製到螢幕的派形區段。Draws the pie segment to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列中的兩個連續點的每一對指定的側邊的多邊形。Every pair of two consecutive points in the array specifies a side of the polygon. 此外，如果不重疊的最後一個點和陣列的第一個點，它們會指定最後一個的側邊的多邊形。In addition, if the last point and the first point of the array do not coincide, they specify the last side of the polygon. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立黑色畫筆。Creates a black pen. - 建立七個點的多邊形頂點的陣列。Creates an array of seven points for the vertices of the polygon. - 繪製多邊形至畫面。Draws the polygon to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所代表的文字`s`參數所表示的矩形內繪製`layoutRectangle`參數。The text represented by the `s` parameter is drawn inside the rectangle represented by the `layoutRectangle` parameter. 如果文字不符合置於矩形內，它會截斷在最接近的字。If the text does not fit inside the rectangle, it is truncated at the nearest word. 若要進一步操作字串將矩形內部的繪製方式採用多載。To further manipulate how the string is drawn inside the rectangle use the overload that takes a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立要繪製的文字字串。Creates a text string to draw. - 定義之字型為 Arial (16pt)。Defines the font as Arial (16pt). - 建立實心、 黑色的筆刷，來繪製。Creates a solid, black brush to draw with. - 建立在其中繪製文字的矩形。Creates a rectangle in which to draw the text. - 將矩形繪製到螢幕。Draws the rectangle to the screen. - 繪製到螢幕使用的字型、 筆刷和目的地矩形的字串。Draws the string to the screen using the font, brush, and destination rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所代表的文字`s`參數所表示的矩形內繪製`layoutRectangle`參數。The text represented by the `s` parameter is drawn inside the rectangle represented by the `layoutRectangle` parameter. 如果文字無法容納置於矩形內，則會截斷在最接近的字，除非另有指定`format`參數。If the text does not fit inside the rectangle, it is truncated at the nearest word, unless otherwise specified with the `format` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立要繪製的文字字串。Creates a text string to draw. - 定義之字型為 Arial (16pt)。Defines the font as Arial (16pt). - 建立實心、 黑色的筆刷，來繪製。Creates a solid, black brush to draw with. - 建立在其中繪製文字的矩形。Creates a rectangle in which to draw the text. - 將矩形繪製到螢幕。Draws the rectangle to the screen. - 設定要置矩形內的字串格式。Sets the format of the string to center it within the rectangle. - 繪製到螢幕使用的字型、 筆刷和目的地矩形的字串。Draws the string to the screen using the font, brush, and destination rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法加方法，以建立巢狀的圖形容器。Use this method with the method to create nested graphics containers. 圖形容器保留圖形的狀態，例如轉換、 裁剪區域和呈現屬性。Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties. 當您呼叫方法，保留狀態的資訊區塊放在堆疊上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法會傳回可識別該資訊區塊。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 當您識別物件傳遞至方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，且用來還原的時間當時的狀態方法呼叫。When you pass the identifying object to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 可以是巢狀容器。也就是說，您可以呼叫方法多次，才能呼叫方法。Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次呼叫方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您收到資訊區塊。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個方法，回復成的時間當時的狀態方法呼叫傳回的特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 資訊區塊放置在堆疊上的方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後的所有資訊區塊放都置於該堆疊上方法呼叫也會移除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 呼叫相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就像方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫。Just as an method call is paired with a method call, a method call is paired with a method call. 當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同樣地，當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 會開啟新的圖形容器，並儲存舊的容器。Opens a new graphics container and saves the old container. - 將轉譯的容器中的全局座標。Translates the world coordinates in the container. - 會以紅色矩形填滿 (已轉換的座標) 新的容器。Fills a red rectangle in the (translated coordinates of the) new container. - 關閉新的容器，並還原已儲存的容器。Closes the new container and restores the saved container. - 填滿儲存容器的綠色矩形 （至未轉換的座標）。Fills a green rectangle (to the untranslated coordinates) of the saved container. 結果會是大小的綠色矩形，這個矩形相同的紅色矩形覆疊。The result is a green rectangle that overlies a red rectangle of the same size. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#90](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#90)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#90](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#90)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#90](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#90)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的表單具有做為其中一個私用成員。The following code example creates a form that has a as one of its private members. 方法呼叫，呼叫表單的`MetafileCallback`中繼檔中的每一筆記錄的方法。The method calls , which calls the form's `MetafileCallback` method for each record in the metafile. `MetafileCallback` 方法會呼叫 方法。The `MetafileCallback` method calls the method. 請注意，`MetafileCallback`方法會接收記錄資料，做為，但方法預期的記錄資料的位元組陣列。Notice that the `MetafileCallback` method receives the record data as an , but the method expects the record data to be a byte array. 若要呼叫將記錄資料複製到位元組陣列，以便將它傳遞至。The call to copies the record data to a byte array so that it can be passed to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .
