remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 任何繪製發生外部所指定的矩形`srcRect`參數已忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須藉由呼叫此方法的特定執行正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. 指定的映像屬性`imageAttr`參數所指定中繼檔已寫入時的取代。The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

public: void EnumerateMetafile(System::Drawing::Imaging::Metafile ^ metafile, System::Drawing::RectangleF destRect, System::Drawing::RectangleF srcRect, System::Drawing::GraphicsUnit srcUnit, System::Drawing::Graphics::EnumerateMetafileProc ^ callback);

member this.EnumerateMetafile : System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile * System.Drawing.RectangleF * System.Drawing.RectangleF * System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit * System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc -> unit

param.name: metafile
param.span: 要列舉的 。

span.span: to enumerate.

param.name: destRect
param.span: 結構，指定所繪製中繼檔的位置和大小。

span.span: structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn metafile.

param.name: srcRect
param.span: 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

span.span: structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.

param.name: srcUnit
param.span: 列舉的成員，指定用來判斷由 srcRect 參數指定的矩形所包含之中繼檔部分的測量單位。

span.span: Member of the enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the srcRect parameter contains.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

span.span: delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.

summary.span: 將所選取矩形中的資料錄從 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的矩形中顯示。

span.span: Sends the records of a selected rectangle from a , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. 任何繪製發生外部所指定的矩形`srcRect`參數已忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

param.name: metafile
param.span: 要列舉的 。

span.span: to enumerate.

param.name: destPoints
param.span: 定義平行四邊型之三個 結構的陣列，會決定所繪製中繼檔的大小和位置。

span.span: Array of three structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.

param.name: srcRect
param.span: 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

span.span: structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.

param.name: srcUnit
param.span: 列舉的成員，指定用來判斷由 srcRect 參數指定的矩形所包含之中繼檔部分的測量單位。

span.span: Member of the enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the srcRect parameter contains.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

span.span: delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.

param.name: callbackData
param.span: 必要但被忽略的內部指標。

span.span: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.

param.span: 您可以為這個參數傳入 。

span.span: You can pass for this parameter.

summary.span: 將所選取矩形中的資料錄從 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的平行四邊形中顯示。

span.span: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 任何繪製發生外部所指定的矩形`srcRect`參數已忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the`callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. 任何繪製發生外部所指定的矩形`srcRect`參數已忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

span.span: to enumerate.

param.name: destPoints
param.span: 定義平行四邊型之三個 結構的陣列，會決定所繪製中繼檔的大小和位置。

span.span: Array of three structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.

param.name: srcRect
param.span: 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

span.span: structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.

param.name: unit
param.span: 列舉的成員，指定用來判斷由 srcRect 參數指定的矩形所包含之中繼檔部分的測量單位。

span.span: Member of the enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the srcRect parameter contains.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

span.span: delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.

param.name: callbackData
param.span: 必要但被忽略的內部指標。

span.span: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.

param.span: 您可以為這個參數傳入 。

summary.span: 將選取之矩形中的記錄從 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以使用指定之影像屬性在指定的平行四邊形中顯示。

span.span: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram using specified image attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`參數會指定三個平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構代表平行四邊形左上角、 右上角和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 所繪製中繼檔是調整，而且修剪來符合平行四邊形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 任何繪製發生外部所指定的矩形`srcRect`參數已忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. 指定的映像屬性`imageAttr`參數所指定中繼檔已寫入時的取代。The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

span.span: Sends the records of a selected rectangle from a , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified rectangle using specified image attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄會個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫來 「 播放 」，或繪製、 記錄方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須這麼做藉由呼叫方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. 任何繪製發生外部所指定的矩形`srcRect`參數已忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. 指定的映像屬性`imageAttr`參數所指定中繼檔已寫入時的取代。The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

span.span: Updates the clip region of this to exclude the area specified by a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會排除所指定的區域`rect`為目前裁剪區域中的參數，並指派至產生的區域屬性這。This method excludes the area specified by the `rect` parameter from the current clip region and assigns the resulting area to the property of this . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 100 像素 x 100 像素矩形的左上角位於座標 （100，100）。Creates a 100 pixel by 100 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (100, 100). - 建立之矩形所定義的區域。Creates a region defined by the rectangle. - 設定要排除的矩形區域的裁剪區域。Sets the clipping region to exclude the rectangular region. - 填入 300 像素 x 300 像素矩形，其左上角位於座標 （0，0） 與實心藍色筆刷。Fills a 300 pixel by 300 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (0, 0) with a solid blue brush. 結果是缺少朝著右下角的方形區域藍色矩形。The result is a blue rectangle with a square region toward its lower-right corner missing. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#92](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#92)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#92](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#92)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#92](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#92)]

summary.span: 填滿由 結構陣列所定義之封閉的基本曲線內部。

span.span: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會填入通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線內部。This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 點陣列必須包含至少 4 個結構。The array of points must contain at least four structures. 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立實心的紅色筆刷。Creates a solid red brush. - 會建立四個點來定義曲線的陣列。Creates an array of four points to define a spline. - 填滿曲線的螢幕上。Fills the curve on the screen. 曲線有預設值為 0.5 張力。The curve has a default tension of 0.5. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#93](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#93)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#93](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#93)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#93](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#93)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會填入通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線內部。This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 點陣列必須包含至少 4 個結構。The array of points must contain at least four structures. `tension`參數會決定曲線的形狀。The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline. 如果值`tension`參數是 0.0，這個方法會繪製的直線線段連接的點。If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points. 通常，`tension`參數小於或等於 1.0 f。Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F. 透過 1.0 f 的值不會產生不尋常的結果。Values over 1.0F produce unusual results. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立實心的紅色筆刷。Creates a solid red brush. - 會建立四個點來定義曲線的陣列。Creates an array of four points to define a spline. - 填滿模式設定為。Sets the fill mode to . - 設定張力為 1.0。Sets the tension to 1.0. - 填滿曲線的螢幕上。Fills the curve on the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會填入通過陣列中的每個點的封閉基本曲線內部。This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最後一個點不符合第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 點陣列必須包含至少 4 個結構。The array of points must contain at least four structures. `tension`參數會決定曲線的形狀。The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline. 如果值`tension`參數是 0.0，這個方法會繪製的直線線段連接的點。If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points. 通常，`tension`參數小於或等於 1.0 f。Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F. 透過 1.0 f 的值不會產生不尋常的結果。Values over 1.0F produce unusual results. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立實心的紅色筆刷。Creates a solid red brush. - 會建立四個點來定義曲線的陣列。Creates an array of four points to define a spline. - 填滿模式設定為。Sets the fill mode to . - 設定張力為 1.0。Sets the tension to 1.0. - 填滿曲線的螢幕上。Fills the curve on the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#98](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#98)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#98](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#98)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#98](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#98)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A直線和曲線線段的一系列所組成。A consists of a series of line and curve segments. 如果路徑以表示`path`參數未關閉，額外的區段加入的最後一個點来關閉路徑的第一個點。If the path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立實心的紅色筆刷。Creates a solid red brush. - 建立圖形路徑物件。Creates a graphics path object. - 將圖形路徑橢圓形。Adds an ellipse to the graphics path. - 填滿螢幕上的路徑。Fills the path on the screen. span.span: Fills the interior of a pie section defined by an ellipse specified by a structure and two radial lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法填滿橢圓形和兩條放射線交集的弧形弧線的端點所定義的派形區域內部。周框定義橢圓形。This method fills the interior of a pie section defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle. 包含的兩條放射線所定義的派形區段`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數和之間交集的那些放射線橢圓形弧線。The pie section consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為分別是 360 度或-360 度。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立實心的紅色筆刷。Creates a solid red brush. - 建立橢圓形的矩形。Creates a rectangle that bounds an ellipse. - 定義 （相對於 x 軸） 的開始角度和掃掠角度 （順時針方向兩者）。Defines the start angle (relative to the x axis) and the sweep angle (both in a clockwise direction). - 填滿的派形區域在螢幕上的橢圓形。Fills the pie-shaped area of the ellipse on the screen. MemberSignature.Usage: graphics.FillPie (brush, x, y, width, height, startAngle, sweepAngle)

param.name: brush
param.span: ，決定填滿的特性。

span.span: that determines the characteristics of the fill.

param.name: x
param.span: 週框左上角的 X 座標，這個週框定義派形區段的來源橢圓形。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.

param.name: y
param.span: 週框左上角的 X 座標，這個週框定義派形區段的來源橢圓形。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.

param.name: width
param.span: 週框的寬度，這個週框定義派形區段的來源橢圓形。

span.span: Width of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.

param.name: height
param.span: 週框的高度，這個週框定義派形區段的來源橢圓形。

span.span: Height of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.

param.name: startAngle
param.span: 以度為單位，依順時針方向測量之從 X 軸到派形區段的第一個邊的角度。

span.span: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie section.

param.name: sweepAngle
param.span: 以度為單位，依順時針方向從 startAngle 參數到派形區段的第二個邊所測量的角度。

span.span: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the startAngle parameter to the second side of the pie section.

summary.span: 填滿由座標對、寬度、高度和兩條放射線指定的橢圓形所定義的派形區域內部。

span.span: Fills the interior of a pie section defined by an ellipse specified by a pair of coordinates, a width, a height, and two radial lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法填滿橢圓形和兩條放射線交集的弧形弧線的端點所定義的派形區域內部。周框定義橢圓形。This method fills the interior of a pie section defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle. 包含的兩條放射線所定義的派形區段`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數，以及這些放射線橢圓形交集之間的弧度。The pie section consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為分別是 360 度或-360 度。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立實心的紅色筆刷。Creates a solid red brush. - 建立的位置和大小的橢圓形的矩形。Creates the location and size of a rectangle that bounds an ellipse. - 定義 （相對於 x 軸） 的開始角度和掃掠角度 （順時針方向兩者）。Defines the start angle (relative to the x axis) and the sweep angle (both in a clockwise direction). - 填滿的派形區域在螢幕上的橢圓形。Fills the pie-shaped area of the ellipse on the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#106](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#106)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#106)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#106)]

span.span: Fills the interior of a polygon defined by an array of points specified by structures.

member this.FillPolygon : System.Drawing.Brush * System.Drawing.Point[] -> unit

param.name: brush
param.span: ，決定填滿的特性。

span.span: that determines the characteristics of the fill.

param.name: points
param.span: 結構的陣列，表示要填滿的多邊形的頂點。

span.span: Array of structures that represent the vertices of the polygon to fill.

summary.span: 填滿由 結構指定的點陣列所定義的多邊形內部。

span.span: Fills the interior of a polygon defined by an array of points specified by structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個陣列中的兩個連續點指定多邊形的一邊。Every two consecutive points in the array specify a side of the polygon. 此外，如果不重疊的最後一個點和第一個點，它們會指定多邊形的右端。In addition, if the last point and the first point do not coincide, they specify the closing side of the polygon. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立實心藍色筆刷。Creates a solid blue brush. - 建立陣列的七個點來定義的多邊形。Creates an array of seven points to define a polygon. - 填滿的多邊形的區域在螢幕上。Fills the polygonal area on the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#107](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#107)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#107)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#107)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為如`intention`參數會指定此方法傳回之後立即開始排清，而值為指定的方法，返回之前等候任何現有的作業完成之前。A value of for the `intention` parameter specifies that the method return immediately after beginning the flush, while a value of specifies that the method wait before returning until any existing operations finish.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該一律呼叫方法，以釋放和相關聯的資源建立方法。You should always call the method to release the and related resources created by the method. 顯示裝置在沒有關聯的 ICM 色彩設定檔，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]預設不會使用該設定檔。Even if the display device has an associated ICM color profile, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will not use that profile by default. 若要啟用的 ICM ，建構HDC 之後您將 HDC （和 ICM_ON） 傳遞給從`SetICMMode`函式。To enable ICM for a , construct the from an HDC after you pass the HDC (and ICM_ON) to the `SetICMMode` function. 然後由任何繪圖根據顯示裝置與相關聯的 ICM 設定檔，將會調整。Then any drawing done by the will be adjusted according to the ICM profile associated with the display device. 啟用 ICM 會導致效能變慢。Enabling ICM will result in slower performance. 裝置內容 （對應模式、 邏輯單元，等等） 時的狀態呼叫可能會影響呈現由。The state of the device context (mapping mode, logical unit, and the like) at the time you call can affect rendering done by the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following action: - 建立的內部指標類型變數`hdc`並將它設定為表單的圖形物件的裝置內容控制代碼。Creates an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets it to the handle to the device context of the graphics object of the form. - 建立新的圖形物件使用`hdc`。Creates a new graphics object using `hdc`. - 繪製有新的圖形物件的矩形 （螢幕上）。Draws a rectangle with the new graphics object (on the screen). - 釋出新的圖形物件使用`hdc`。Releases the new graphics object using `hdc`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#118](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#118)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#118](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#118)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#118](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#118)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果影像具有索引像素格式，這個方法會擲回的例外狀況訊息、 「 從具有索引像素格式的映像不能建立圖形物件 」。If the image has an indexed pixel format, this method throws an exception with the message, "A Graphics object cannot be created from an image that has an indexed pixel format." 下列清單中，會顯示索引像素格式。The indexed pixel formats are shown in the following list. - - - 您可以使用索引的映像將儲存為另一種格式方法，然後擷取新映像的物件。You can save the indexed image as another format by using the method and then retrieve a object for the new image. 這個方法也會擲回例外狀況如果該映像包含任何下列的像素格式。This method also throws an exception if the image has any of the following pixel formats. - - - - 您應該一律呼叫方法，以釋放和相關聯的資源建立方法。You should always call the method to release the and related resources created by the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following action: - 建立從圖形檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例資料夾中。Creates an from a graphics file SampImag.jpg in the example folder. - 建立從。Creates a from the . - 來填滿的矩形中變更該影像。Alters the image by filling a rectangle within it. - 繪製至螢幕。Draws the to the screen. - 釋放建立。Releases the created . remarks.format: ## Remarks 目的方法是啟用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]顯示器使用的每個像素的 8 位元時，產生更好的品質半色調。The purpose of the method is to enable [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] to produce a better quality halftone when the display uses 8 bits per pixel. 若要顯示使用半色調調色盤的映像，請使用下列程序。To display an image using the halftone palette, use the following procedure. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 定義互通性Windows DLL 檔案 gdi32.dll，其中包含必要的屬性[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。Defines interoperability attributes for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll, which contains the necessary [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions. - 定義`SelectPalette`和`RealizePalette`為外部 DLL 中的函式。Defines the `SelectPalette` and `RealizePalette` functions in that DLL as external. - 建立從現有的映像檔 SampImag.jpg （這必須是相同的範例程式碼檔案的資料夾中） 的映像並將影像繪製至螢幕。Creates an image from an existing image file SampImag.jpg (which must be in the same folder as the example code file) and draws the image to the screen. - 建立內部指標類型變數，並將其值分別設定為 圖形物件和目前的 Windows 半色調調色盤的控制代碼。Creates internal pointer type variables and sets their values to the handle to the graphics object and to the current Windows halftone palette, respectively. - 選取，並使用半色調調色盤。Selects and realizes the halftone palette. - 建立新的圖形物件使用`hdc`參數。Creates a new graphics object using the `hdc` parameter. - 一次繪製影像。Draws the image again. - 釋放裝置內容控制代碼。Releases the handle to the device context. 結果是兩個範例影像的呈現： 其中一個 16 位元調色盤，另一個使用 8 位元調色盤。The result is two renderings of the sample image: one with the 16-bit palette and one with the 8-bit palette. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#121](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#121)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#121](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#121)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#121](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#121)]

summary.span: 取得與這個 關聯之裝置內容的控制代碼。

span.span: Gets the handle to the device context associated with this .

returns.span: 與這個 關聯之裝置內容的控制代碼。

span.span: Handle to the device context associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 裝置內容是根據 Windows 結構[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]，定義一組圖形物件和其相關聯的屬性，以及會影響輸出的圖形化模式。The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output. 這個方法會傳回字型的裝置內容。This method returns that device context with the exception of a font. 因為未選取字型，則呼叫方法使用所傳回的控制代碼方法將會失敗。Because a font is not selected, calls to the method using a handle returned from the method will fail. 呼叫和方法必須出現在配對中。Calls to the and methods must appear in pairs. 在範圍期間和方法組，您通常只對進行呼叫[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。During the scope of a and method pair, you usually make only calls to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions. 呼叫，範圍對[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法產生`hdc`參數失敗，並`ObjectBusy`錯誤。Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error. 此外，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]會忽略所做的狀態變更的`hdc`後續作業中的參數。Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 本範例會示範呼叫 Windows[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式來執行相同的工作[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法。The example illustrates calling a Windows [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function to perform the same task as a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 定義互通性Windows DLL 檔案 gdi32.dll 的屬性。Defines the interoperability attribute for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll. 此 DLL 包含所需[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。This DLL contains the desired [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function. - 定義為外部 DLL 中的函式。Defines the function in that DLL as external. - 建立紅色畫筆。Creates a red pen. - 使用畫筆繪製矩形螢幕使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法。With the pen, draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. - 定義的內部指標類型變數`hdc`並將其值設定為表單的裝置內容控制代碼。Defines an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets its value to the handle to the device context of the form. - 繪製矩形螢幕使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。Draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function. - 釋放裝置內容所表示`hdc`參數。Releases the device context represented by the `hdc` parameter. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#122](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#122)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#122](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#122)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#122](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#122)]

span.span: for access to unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立任意色彩 ARGB 座標為 （255，165、 63，136）。Creates an arbitrary color with ARGB coordinates (255, 165, 63, 136). - 建立實心筆刷，並將其色彩會設定為指定的色彩。Creates a solid brush and sets its color to the specified color. - 填滿橢圓形使用任意色彩。Fills an ellipse using the arbitrary color. - 建立第二個色彩，並將其值設定為最接近的系統 ARGB 色彩。Creates a second color and sets its value to the nearest system ARGB color. - 第二個橢圓形填入這個色彩。Fills a second ellipse with this color. 結果是兩個橢圓形： 第一個繪製具有任意指定的色彩和第二個以最接近指定的色彩系統色彩繪製。The result is two ellipses: the first drawn with the arbitrary specified color and the second drawn with the system color nearest the specified color. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#123](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#123)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#123](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#123)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#123](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#123)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將指派給屬性這為目前裁剪區域和所指定的矩形的交集的區域`rect`參數。This method assigns to the property of this the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立矩形左上角，在 （0，0） 和設定這個矩形的裁剪區域。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle. - 建立第二個矩形左上角，在 （100，100） 並將裁剪區域設定為目前裁剪區域 （第一個矩形） 這個矩形的交集。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle). - 填滿包含實心藍色筆刷與前的兩個矩形的大矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush. - 將裁剪區域重設為無限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 兩個裁剪區域周圍繪製的矩形。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions. 它會使用黑色畫筆裁剪方框第一個和第二個的裁剪區域的紅色畫筆。It uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region. 結果是兩個矩形的交集會填滿藍色。The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#124](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#124)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#124](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#124)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#124](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#124)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將指派給屬性這為目前裁剪區域和所指定的矩形的交集的區域`rect`參數。This method assigns to the property of this the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立矩形左上角，在 （0，0） 和設定這個矩形的裁剪區域。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle. - 建立第二個矩形左上角，在 （100，100） 並將裁剪區域設定為目前裁剪區域 （第一個矩形） 這個矩形的交集。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle). - 填滿包含實心藍色筆刷與前的兩個矩形的大矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush. - 將裁剪區域重設為無限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 兩個裁剪區域周圍繪製的矩形。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions. 它會使用黑色畫筆裁剪方框第一個和第二個的裁剪區域的紅色畫筆。It uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region. 結果是兩個矩形的交集會填滿藍色。The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將指派給屬性這表示由目前裁剪區域和所指定區域交集的區域`region`參數。This method assigns to the property of this the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the region specified by the `region` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立矩形左上角，在 （0，0）。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0). - 建立區域並將它設定為在矩形中，並設定到此區域的裁剪區域。Creates a region and sets it to the rectangle, and sets the clipping region to this region. - 建立第二個矩形左上角，在 （100，100）。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100). - 建立區域並將其設為第二個矩形中，設定裁剪區域的此區域和目前裁剪區域 （第一個矩形） 使用的合併模式的交集。Creates a region and sets it to the second rectangle, and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this region and the current clipping region (the first rectangle) using a combine mode of . - 填滿大型的矩形包含實心藍色筆刷前的兩個區域。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous regions with a solid blue brush. - 將裁剪區域重設為無限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 兩個裁剪區域周圍繪製的矩形。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions. 它會使用黑色畫筆的第一個的裁剪區域和紅色畫筆，而第二個的裁剪區域。It uses a black pen for the first clipping region and a red pen for the second clipping region. 結果是兩個區域的交集會填滿藍色。The result is that only the intersection of the two regions is filled with blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#126](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#126)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#126](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#126)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#126](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#126)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立矩形的裁剪區域，並將它設定為使用表單的圖形物件的裁剪區域。Creates a rectangular clipping region and sets it as the clipping region for the graphics object of the form using . - 建立兩個點的裁剪區域內，一個外部。Creates two points, one inside the clipping region and one outside. - 測試每個可視性的點，且只繪製可見。Tests each of the points for visibility and draws only the visible one. 結果是一個小紅色圓形，裁剪區域中。The result is one small red circle, which is within the clip region. summary.span: 取得 物件的陣列，每個陣列框住指定字串中字元位置的範圍。

span.span: Gets an array of objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.

span.span: This method returns an array of objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的區域是精確度的解析度而定，因此可能會有些微遺失如果字串是精確度的一種解析度中繼檔中記錄，而且稍後播放不同解析度。The regions returned by this method are resolution-dependent, so there might be a slight loss of accuracy if strings are recorded in a metafile at one resolution and later played back at a different resolution. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 設定字串 「 第一個和第二個範圍"和顯示字串 ("Times New Roman"，16 點) 的字型。Sets a string "First and Second ranges" and a font for display of the string ("Times New Roman", 16 point). - 設定兩個字元的字串內的範圍 （其對應的單字"第一次 」 和 「 第二個"）。Sets two character ranges within the string (which correspond to the words "First" and "Second"). - 建立要在其中顯示字串的矩形。Creates a rectangle in which to display the string. - 設定字串 ¾ 包括兩個字元範圍的格式。Sets the formatting of the string ¾ including the two character ranges. - 將字串繪製到螢幕。Draws the string to the screen. - 測量的字元範圍，會決定繫結兩個指定之範圍的矩形。Measures the character ranges, determines rectangles that bound the two specified ranges. - 將兩個矩形繪製到螢幕。Draws the two rectangles to the screen. 結果是顯示的字串 （"第一次 」） 以紅色矩形所限定的第一個範圍與第二個 （「 第二個"） 以藍色矩形所限定的範圍。The result is the displayed string with the first range ("First") bounded by a red rectangle and the second range ("Second") bounded by a blue rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#135](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#135)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#135](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#135)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#135](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#135)]

summary.span: 以指定的 物件繪製時，測量指定的字串。

span.span: Measures the specified string when drawn with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法專為搭配個別字串和之前和之後要允許突出圖像 （glyph） 的字串，包含少量的額外空間設計。The method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs. 此外，方法調整字符點以最佳化顯示品質，並可能顯示比所報告的窄字串。Also, the method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by . 取得度量資訊適用於配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串，請使用方法或其中一個方法，取得，並傳遞。To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the method or one of the methods that takes a , and pass . 此外，請確定如是。Also, ensure the for the is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立要測量的字串。Creates a string to measure. - 建立字型物件，並將其設為新細明體 （16 點）。Creates a font object and sets it to Arial (16 point). - 建立的大小物件並使用它和字型物件來測量字串的大小。Creates a size object and uses it and the font object to measure the size of the string. - 繪製使用測量字串的大小以紅色矩形。Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string. - 繪製所繪製的矩形內的字串。Draws the string within the drawn rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks `width`參數指定的寬度元件所傳回的最大值結構 ()。The `width` parameter specifies the maximum value of the width component of the returned structure (). 如果`width`參數是字串，傳回的實際寬度小於元件就會截斷為代表符合指定的寬度的字元的數目上限的值。If the `width` parameter is less than the actual width of the string, the returned component is truncated to a value representing the maximum number of characters that will fit within the specified width. 若要容納整個字串，傳回的元件會調整為可讓顯示的字串字元換行的值。To accommodate the entire string, the returned component is adjusted to a value that allows displaying the string with character wrap. 方法專為搭配個別字串和之前和之後要允許突出圖像 （glyph） 的字串，包含少量的額外空間設計。The method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs. 此外，方法調整字符點以最佳化顯示品質，並可能顯示比所報告的窄字串。Also, the method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by . 取得度量資訊適用於配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串，請使用方法或其中一個方法，取得，並傳遞。To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the method or one of the methods that takes a , and pass . 此外，請確定如是。Also, ensure the for the is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立要測量的字串和新細明體 （16 點） 設定的字型物件。Creates a string to measure and a font object set to Arial (16 point). - 設定字串的最大寬度。Sets the maximum width of the string. - 建立的大小物件，並用於測量字串的大小、 字型物件和字串的最大寬度。Creates a size object and uses it, the font object, and the maximum string width to measure the size of the string. - 繪製使用測量字串的大小以紅色矩形。Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string. - 繪製所繪製的矩形內的字串。Draws the string within the drawn rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法專為搭配個別字串和之前和之後要允許突出圖像 （glyph） 的字串，包含少量的額外空間設計。The method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs. 此外，方法調整字符點以最佳化顯示品質，並可能顯示比所報告的窄字串。Also, the method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by . 取得度量資訊適用於配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串，請使用方法或其中一個方法，取得並傳遞。To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the method or one of the methods that takes a and pass . 此外也請確認如是。Also ensure the for the is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立要測量的字串和新細明體 （16 點） 設定的字型物件Creates a string to measure and a font object set to Arial (16 point) - 設定字串的最大的配置大小。Sets the maximum layout size of the string. - 建立物件的字串格式，並將它的格式旗標設定為。Creates a string format object and sets its format flags to . - 會建立整數變數`charactersFitted`和`linesFilled`和大小的物件，以量值的字串。Creates the integer variables `charactersFitted` and `linesFilled` and a size object to measure the string. - 字串的大小，並決定的字元數和填滿，使用字串、 字型物件、 最大配置大小和字串格式的行數。Measures the size of the string and determines the number of characters fitted and lines filled, using the string, the font object, the maximum layout size, and the string format. - 繪製使用測量字串的大小以紅色矩形。Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string. - 繪製所繪製的矩形內的字串。Draws the string within the drawn rectangle. - 繪製的字元數和填滿的行數的值。Draws the values of the number of characters fitted and lines filled. 結果是垂直矩形封入垂直的字串。The result is a vertical rectangle enclosing a vertical string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的前面加上所指定的矩陣`matrix`參數，使結果`matrix`x 全局轉換。This method prepends the matrix specified by the `matrix` parameter, so that the result is `matrix` x world transformation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立`transformMatrix`矩陣 （兩個由兩個身分識別矩陣，加上零轉譯向量）。Creates a `transformMatrix` matrix (a two by two identity matrix plus a zero-translation vector). - 轉換的向量 （200，100） 的轉換矩陣。Translates the transform matrix by a vector (200, 100). - 30 度旋轉的 Windows Form 的自然變換矩陣，前面加上 30 度表單的轉換矩陣的旋轉矩陣。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees, prepends the rotation matrix for 30 degrees to the form's transformation matrix. - 旋轉的自然變換矩陣乘以翻譯`transformMatrix`，和前面加上`transformMatrix`至的自然變換矩陣。Multiplies the rotated world transformation matrix by the translated `transformMatrix`, and prepends the `transformMatrix` to the world transformation matrix. - 繪製旋轉、 轉換的橢圓形。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#143](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#143)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#143](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#143)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#143](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#143)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 裝置內容是根據 Windows 結構[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]，定義一組圖形物件和其相關聯的屬性，以及會影響輸出的圖形化模式。The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output. 呼叫和方法必須出現在配對中。Calls to the and methods must appear in pairs. 在範圍期間和方法組，您通常進行呼叫只[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。During the scope of a and method pair, you usually make calls only to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions. 呼叫，範圍對[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法產生`hdc`參數失敗，並`ObjectBusy`錯誤。Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error. 此外，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]會忽略所做的狀態變更的`hdc`後續作業中的參數。Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 本範例會示範呼叫 Windows[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式來執行相同的工作[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法。The example illustrates calling a Windows [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function to perform the same task as a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 定義互通性Windows DLL 檔案 gdi32.dll 的屬性。Defines the interoperability attribute for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll. 此 DLL 包含所需[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式，所以它定義為外部 DLL 中的函式。This DLL contains the desired [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function, and it defines the function in that DLL as external. - 建立紅色畫筆。Creates a red pen. - 使用畫筆繪製矩形螢幕使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法。With the pen, draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. - 定義的內部指標類型變數`hdc`並將其值設定為表單的裝置內容控制代碼。Defines an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets its value to the handle to the device context of the form. - 繪製矩形螢幕使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。Draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function. - 釋放裝置內容所表示`hdc`參數。Releases the device context represented by the `hdc` parameter. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#145](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#145)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#145](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#145)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#145](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#145)]

summary.span: 將這個 的裁剪區域重設為無限區域。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當的裁剪區域為無限，這個項目繪製並未被截斷。When the clipping region of a is infinite, items that this draws are not clipped. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立矩形左上角，在 （0，0） 和設定這個矩形的裁剪區域。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle. - 建立第二個矩形左上角，在 （100，100） 並將裁剪區域設定為目前裁剪區域 （第一個矩形） 這個矩形的交集。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle). - 填滿包含實心藍色筆刷與前的兩個矩形的大矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush. - 將裁剪區域重設為無限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 兩個裁剪區域; 周圍繪製矩形它會使用黑色畫筆裁剪方框第一個和第二個的裁剪區域的紅色畫筆。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions; it uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region. 結果是兩個矩形的交集會填滿藍色。The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#146](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#146)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#146](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#146)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#146](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#146)]

summary.span: 將這個 的自然變換矩陣重設為識別矩陣。

span.span: Resets the world transformation matrix of this to the identity matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 矩陣表示沒有縮放、 旋轉或轉移轉換。The identity matrix represents a transformation with no scaling, rotation, or translation. 重設這的自然變換為識別矩陣表示其全局轉換不會變更之幾何的已轉換的項目。Resetting the world transformation of this to the identity matrix means that its world transformation does not change the geometry of transformed items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 將 Windows Form 的自然變換轉譯向量 （100，0）。Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0). - 儲存表單的圖形狀態。Saves the graphics state of the form. - 重設為識別表單的自然變換和與實心的紅色筆刷填滿的矩形。Resets the world transform of the form to an identity and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush. - 還原已轉換的圖形狀態，並使用純色藍色筆刷填滿的矩形。Restores the translated graphics state and fills a rectangle with a solid blue brush. 結果是未轉譯的紅色填滿的矩形，翻譯的藍色填滿的矩形。The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle and a translated blue-filled rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#147](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#147)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#147](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#147)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#147](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#147)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫方法，保留狀態的資訊區塊放在堆疊上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法會傳回可識別該資訊區塊。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 傳遞時，用來識別至方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，且用來還原的時間當時的狀態方法呼叫。When you pass the identifying to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 請注意，給定呼叫所傳回的方法可以一次傳遞至`Restore`方法。Note that the returned by a given call to the method can be passed only once to the `Restore` method. 呼叫方法可以巢狀結構; 也就是說，您可以呼叫方法多次，才能呼叫方法。Calls to the method can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次呼叫方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您收到資訊區塊。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個方法，回復成的時間當時的狀態方法呼叫傳回的特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 資訊區塊放置在堆疊上的方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後的所有資訊區塊放都置於該堆疊上方法呼叫也會移除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 呼叫相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就像呼叫搭配呼叫，方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫。Just as a call is paired with a call, a method call is paired with a method call. 當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同樣地，當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 將 Windows Form 的自然變換轉譯向量 （100，0）。Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0). - 儲存表單的圖形狀態。Saves the graphics state of the form. - 重設為識別表單的自然變換和與實心的紅色筆刷填滿的矩形。Resets the world transform of the form to an identity and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush. - 還原已轉換的圖形狀態，並使用實心藍色筆刷填滿第二個矩形。Restores the translated graphics state and fills a second rectangle with a solid blue brush. 結果是未轉譯的紅色填滿的矩形，翻譯的藍色填滿的矩形。The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle and a translated blue-filled rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 旋轉作業包括將其項目衍生自矩陣轉換矩陣乘以`angle`參數。The rotation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose elements are derived from the `angle` parameter. 這個方法會套用旋轉附加在它前面的轉換矩陣。This method applies the rotation by prepending it to the transformation matrix. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 將 Windows form 的自然變換矩陣轉換向量 （100，0）。Translates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by the vector (100, 0). - 旋轉的自然變換的角度 30 度，前面加上的自然變換矩陣的旋轉矩陣。Rotates the world transformation by an angle of 30 degrees, prepending the rotation matrix to the world transformation matrix. - 旋轉、 轉換使用畫筆繪製橢圓形藍色。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse with a blue pen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 平滑模式指定線條、 曲線和填滿區域的邊緣是否使用平滑效果 （也稱為反鋸齒功能）。The smoothing mode specifies whether lines, curves, and the edges of filled areas use smoothing (also called antialiasing). 其中一個例外是路徑漸層筆刷不會遵照平滑模式。One exception is that path gradient brushes do not obey the smoothing mode. 填滿使用的區域會呈現相同的方式 （別名），不論屬性。Areas filled using a are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the property. ## Examples 下列方法示範如何設定作用的， ，和屬性。The following method demonstrates the effects of setting the , , and properties. 在下圖顯示範例的輸出。The output of the example is shown in the following illustration. ![行數並沒有套用平滑效果。](~/add/media/gdi-smoothingmode.png "行並沒有套用平滑效果。")![Lines with and without smoothing applied.](~/add/media/gdi-smoothingmode.png "Lines with and without smoothing applied.") 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowPensAndSmoothingMode`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks Gamma 修正值必須是介於 0 到 12 之間。The gamma correction value must be between 0 and 12. 預設值為 4。The default value is 4. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and properties. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ChangeTextRenderingHintAndTextContrast`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ChangeTextRenderingHintAndTextContrast` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個文字呈現提示會指定使用反鋸齒功能是否呈現文字。The text rendering hint specifies whether text renders with antialiasing. > [!NOTE] > 您不應該使用屬性值為時屬性設定為。You should not use a property value of when the property is set to . 無法在發生例外狀況或映像可能無法正確呈現。An exception could occur or the image may not render correctly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and properties. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ChangeTextRenderingHintAndTextContrast`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ChangeTextRenderingHintAndTextContrast` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks GDI + 會使用三種座標空間： world、 頁面和裝置。GDI+ uses three coordinate spaces: world, page, and device. 全局座標是用來建立模型特定的圖形範圍的座標，您將傳遞至方法在.NET Framework 中的座標。World coordinates are the coordinates used to model a particular graphic world and are the coordinates you pass to methods in the .NET Framework. 頁面座標是指繪圖介面，例如表單或控制項所使用的座標系統。Page coordinates refer to the coordinate system used by a drawing surface, such as a form or a control. 裝置座標是實體裝置上，繪製在螢幕或印表機等所使用的座標。Device coordinates are the coordinates used by the physical device being drawn on, such as a screen or a printer. 屬性表示全局轉換，會對應至頁面座標全局座標。The property represents the world transformation, which maps world coordinates to page coordinates. 因為矩陣傳回和屬性為的幾何轉換的複本，當您不再需要時，應該處置的矩陣。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

summary.span: 使用這個 的目前全局和頁面轉換，將點陣列從一個座標空間轉換到另一個座標空間。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立兩個點，和它們之間繪製藍線。Creates two points and draws a blue line between them. - 設定要在 x 方向 y 方向 30 40 數量的世界轉換。Sets the world transform to translate by amounts 40 in the x direction and 30 in the y direction. - 轉換全局座標的點 () 頁面座標 ()。Transforms the points from world coordinates () to page coordinates (). - 重設識別全局轉換。Resets the world transformation to the identity. - 已轉換的點之間繪製紅線。Draws a red line between the transformed points. 結果是藍線，其下的已翻譯紅線。The result is a blue line and a translated red line below it. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立裁剪區域的矩形。Creates a rectangle for the clipping region. - 設定的裁剪區域為矩形。Sets the clipping region to the rectangle. - 轉換的向量 （50，50） 的裁剪區域。Translates the clipping region by a vector (50, 50). - 填入實心黑色筆刷大的矩形。Fills a large rectangle with a solid black brush. 結果是一個翻譯、 小型的黑色矩形。The result is a translated, small, black rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 來源通常是繪圖介面上限左上角。The origin is typically the upper-left-hand corner of the drawing surface. 轉譯作業包括將其轉譯部分是的矩陣轉換矩陣乘以`dx`和`dy`參數。The translation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose translation part is the `dx` and `dy` parameters. 這個方法會將轉換套用附加在前面的轉換矩陣的轉移矩陣。This method applies the translation by prepending the translation matrix to the transformation matrix. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 您可以將 Windows form 的自然變換矩陣旋轉 30.0F 度。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30.0F degrees. - 藉由呼叫移動來源的圖形物件，前面加上的轉換矩陣的翻譯。Moves the origin of the graphics object by calling , prepending the translation to the transformation matrix. - 翻譯、 旋轉使用畫筆繪製橢圓形藍色。Draws a translated, rotated ellipse with a blue pen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#167](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#167)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#167](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#167)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#167](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#167)] 下圖顯示執行先前的程式碼範例的輸出。The following illustration shows the output of running the previous code example. ![Translated 和已轉換的橢圓形](~/add/media/ndp-tranlatetransform.png "Translated 和已轉換的橢圓形")![Translated and transformed ellipse](~/add/media/ndp-tranlatetransform.png "Translated and transformed ellipse")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉譯作業包括將其轉譯部分是的矩陣轉換矩陣乘以`dx`和`dy`參數。The translation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose translation part is the `dx` and `dy` parameters. 這個方法會附加之前，或附加的變換矩陣所根據的轉譯矩陣`order`參數。This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the by the translation matrix according to the `order` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 您可以將 Windows form 的自然變換矩陣旋轉 30.0F 度。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30.0F degrees. - 藉由呼叫移動圖形物件的原始，將轉譯附加到的自然變換矩陣。Moves the graphics object's origin by calling , appending the translation to the world transformation matrix. - 旋轉、 轉換使用畫筆繪製橢圓形藍色。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse with a blue pen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#168](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#168)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#168](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#168)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#168](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#168)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的矩形的單位由所指定屬性。The unit for resulting rectangle is designated by the property. 預設單位為像素。The default unit is pixels. A通常與控制項相關聯的來源矩形將會相對於該控制項的用戶端區域。A is typically associated with a control and the origin of the rectangle will be relative to the client area of that control. 之可見裁剪區域是這樣的裁剪區域的交集和視窗的裁剪區域。The visible clipping region is the intersection of the clipping region of this and the clipping region of the window.
